Whether or not multiple triggers per game tick are allowed
tweakeroo.label.config_comment.single_pl:
§6Note: This feature works either at all or§r
§6at least fully only in single player§r

tweakeroo.message.repair_mode.swapped_re: Swapped a repairable item to %s slot

tweakeroo.message.set_snap_aim_yaw_step_: Set Snap Aim yaw step to %s

Swapped a low durability item for a dummy item
Swapped a low durability item off the player's hand

tweakeroo.message.toggled_fly_speed_on: Toggled Fly Speed tweak %s, preset: %s, speed: %s

tweakeroo.message.toggled_slot_randomize: Toggled Hotbar Slot Randomizer tweak %s, max slot: %s

tweakeroo.message.toggled_snap_aim_on_ya: Toggled Yaw Snap Aim %s, with yaw step size %s degrees
The number of right clicks to do per pla:
The number of right clicks to do per placed block when
tweakAfterClicker is enabled
The block reach distance to use if the\n:
The block reach distance to use if the
override tweak is enabled.
The maximum the server allows is 8 for placing, 6 for breaking.
The grid interval size for the grid brea:
The grid interval size for the grid breaking mode.
To quickly adjust the value, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.
The Breaking Restriction mode to use (ho: The Breaking Restriction mode to use (hotkey-selectable)
The background color for the chat messag:
The background color for the chat messages,
if 'tweakChatBackgroundColor' is enabled
The time format for chat messages, if tw:
The time format for chat messages, if tweakChatTimestamp is enabled
Uses the Java SimpleDateFormat format specifiers.
Enable single player and client side pla:
Enable single player and client side placement rotations,
such as Accurate Placement working in single player without Carpet mod
Whether or not to render the real pitch:
Whether or not to render the real pitch angle
indicator when the elytra camera mode is active
The maximum number of blocks to place pe:
The maximum number of blocks to place per game tick
with the Fast Block Placement tweak
The number of left clicks to do per game:
The number of left clicks to do per game tick when
tweakFastLeftClick is enabled and the attack button is held down
The number of right clicks to do per gam:
The number of right clicks to do per game tick when
tweakFastRightClick is enabled and the use button is held down
The new /fill and /clone block limit in:
The new /fill and /clone block limit in single player,
if the tweak to override them is enabled
The color of the currently pointed-at\nr:
The color of the currently pointed-at
region in block placement the overlay
If enabled, then toggling on/off the Fre:
If enabled, then toggling on/off the Free Camera mode
will also automatically toggle on/off the free camera motion feature
The gamma value to use when the override: The gamma value to use when the override option is enabled
If enabled, then hand restocking happens:
If enabled, then hand restocking happens
before the stack runs out
This is the last hotbar slot to use/cycl:
This is the last hotbar slot to use/cycle through
if the hotbar slot cycle tweak is enabled.
Basically the cycle will jump back to the first slot
when going over the maximum slot number set here.
This is the last hotbar slot to use if t:
This is the last hotbar slot to use if the hotbar slot randomizer
tweak is enabled. Basically the selected hotbar slot will be randomly
picked from 1 to this maximum slot after an item use.
The positioning of the hotbar swap overl: The positioning of the hotbar swap overlay
The horizontal offset of the hotbar swap: The horizontal offset of the hotbar swap overlay
The vertical offset of the hotbar swap o: The vertical offset of the hotbar swap overlay
This is the durability threshold (in use:
This is the durability threshold (in uses left)
for the low-durability item swap feature.
Note that items with low total durability will go lower
and be swapped at 5%% left.
Use an alternative version of the Lava V:
Use an alternative version of the Lava Visibility,
which is Optifine compatible (but more hacky).
Implementation credit to Nessie.
The size of the rendered map previews: The size of the rendered map previews
The number of game ticks between automat: The number of game ticks between automatic attacks (left clicks)
The number of game ticks between automatic uses (right clicks)
If true, then the permanent sneak tweak:
If true, then the permanent sneak tweak will
also work while GUIs are open
The grid interval size for the grid plac:
The grid interval size for the grid placement mode.
To quickly adjust the value, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.
The number of blocks you are able to pla:
The number of blocks you are able to place at maximum per
right click, if tweakPlacementLimit is enabled.
To quickly adjust the value, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.
The Placement Restriction mode to use (h: The Placement Restriction mode to use (hotkey-selectable)
When enabled, the Placement Restriction:
When enabled, the Placement Restriction mode will toggle
its state of/off when you toggle the Fast Placement mode.
Only warn about potion effects running o: Only warn about potion effects running out that are marked as "beneficial"
The remaining duration of potion effects:
The remaining duration of potion effects (in ticks)
after which the warning will start showing
Maximum number of item entities rendered:
Maximum number of item entities rendered per frame.
Use -1 for normal behaviour, ie. to disable this limit.
Maximum number of XP orb entities render:
Maximum number of XP orb entities rendered per frame.
Use -1 for normal behaviour, ie. to disable this limit.
Enables tinting/coloring the Shulker Box:
Enables tinting/coloring the Shulker Box display
background texture with the dye color of the box
Whether or not holding shift is required: Whether or not holding shift is required for the Shulker Box preview
This prevents the server from overriding:
This prevents the server from overriding the durability or
stack size on items that are being used quickly for example
with the fast right click tweak.
Whether or not to render the snap aim an: Whether or not to render the snap aim angle indicator
The color for the snap aim indicator bac: The color for the snap aim indicator background
Snap aim mode: yaw, or pitch, or both: Snap aim mode: yaw, or pitch, or both
Whether or not to allow overshooting the:
Whether or not to allow overshooting the pitch angle
from the normal +/- 90 degrees up to +/- 180 degrees
The pitch angle step of the snap aim twe: The pitch angle step of the snap aim tweak
The yaw angle step of the snap aim tweak: The yaw angle step of the snap aim tweak
The maximum dimensions for a Structure B: The maximum dimensions for a Structure Block's saved area
The FOV value used for the zoom feature: The FOV value used for the zoom feature
Fixes the client world chunks essentiall:
Fixes the client world chunks essentially duping their
entities when chunk packets are received
Elytra deployment/landing fix by Earthco: Elytra deployment/landing fix by Earthcomputer and Nessie
Adds a fix for the debug profiler pie ch: Adds a fix for the debug profiler pie chart, that broke in MC 1.14.4
Fixes Ravagers breaking blocks on the cl:
Fixes Ravagers breaking blocks on the client side,
which causes annoying ghost blocks/block desyncs
Optimizes the removal of unloading TileE:
Optimizes the removal of unloading TileEntities from the World lists.
This can greatly improve performance if there are lots of
TileEntities loaded and/or unloading at once.
The item restriction type for the Fast B: The item restriction type for the Fast Block Placement tweak
The items that are NOT allowed to be use:
The items that are NOT allowed to be used for the Fast Block Placement tweak,
if the fastPlacementItemListType is set to Black List
The items that are allowed to be used fo:
The items that are allowed to be used for the Fast Block Placement tweak,
if the fastPLacementItemListType is set to White List
The targeted block restriction type for: The targeted block restriction type for the Fast Right Click tweak
The blocks that are NOT allowed to be ri:
The blocks that are NOT allowed to be right clicked on with
the Fast Right Click tweak, if the fastRightClickBlockListType is set to Black List
The blocks that are allowed to be right:
The blocks that are allowed to be right clicked on with
the Fast Right Click tweak, if the fastRightClickBlockListType is set to White List
The item restriction type for the Fast R: The item restriction type for the Fast Right Click tweak
The items that are NOT allowed to be use:
The items that are NOT allowed to be used for the Fast Right Click tweak,
if the fastRightClickListType is set to Black List
The items that are allowed to be used fo:
The items that are allowed to be used for the Fast Right Click tweak,
if the fastRightClickListType is set to White List
Custom flat world preset strings.\nThese:
Custom flat world preset strings.
These are in the format: name;blocks_string;biome;generation_features;icon_item
The blocks string format is the vanilla format, such as: 62*minecraft:dirt,minecraft:grass
The biome can be the registry name, or the int ID
The icon item name format is minecraft:iron_nugget
The list type for potion warning effects: The list type for potion warning effects
The potion effects that will not be warn: The potion effects that will not be warned about
The only potion effects that will be war: The only potion effects that will be warned about
The slots the repair mode should use\nVa:
The slots the repair mode should use
Valid values: mainhand, offhand, head, chest, legs, feet
The items that should be considered for:
The items that should be considered for the
'tweakItemUnstackingProtection' tweak
If enabled, then the Flexible Block Plac:
If enabled, then the Flexible Block Placement and the
Accurate Block Placement use the protocol implemented
in the recent carpet mod versions
If enabled, then the fast placement mode:
If enabled, then the fast placement mode will always remember
the orientation of the first block you place.
Without this, the orientation will only be remembered
with the flexible placement enabled and active.
If enabled, then the flexible block plac:
If enabled, then the flexible block placement status
will be remembered from the first placed block,
as long as the use key is held down.
Enables a simpler version of Flexible pl:
Enables a simpler version of Flexible placement, similar to
the Carpet mod, so basically either facing into or out
from the block face clicked on.
Enables a \"after clicker\" tweak, which:
Enables a "after clicker" tweak, which does automatic right
clicks on the just-placed block.
Useful for example for Repeaters (setting the delay).
To quickly adjust the value, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.
Enables an aim lock, locking the yaw and:
Enables an aim lock, locking the yaw and pitch rotations
to the current values.
This is separate from the snap aim lock,
which locks them to the snapped value.
This allows locking them "freely" to the current value.
Enables an \"Angel Block\" tweak, which:
Enables an "Angel Block" tweak, which allows
placing blocks in mid-air in Creative mode
Overrides the block reach distance with\:
Overrides the block reach distance with
the one set in Generic -> blockReachDistance
When enabled, you can only break blocks:
When enabled, you can only break blocks in
a grid pattern, with a configurable interval.
To quickly adjust the interval, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.
Enables the Breaking Restriction mode\n:
Enables the Breaking Restriction mode
  (Plane, Layer, Face, Column, Line, Diagonal).
Basically only allows you to break blocks
in those patterns, while holding down the attack key.
Overrides the default chat background co:
Overrides the default chat background color
with the one from Generics -> 'chatBackgroundColor'
Stores the text from the chat input text:
Stores the text from the chat input text field
and restores it when the chat is opened again
Adds extra fields to the Command Block G:
Adds extra fields to the Command Block GUI, for settings
the name of the command block, and seeing the stats results
Allows adding custom flat world presets:
Allows adding custom flat world presets to the list.
The presets are defined in Lists -> flatWorldPresets
Enables empty Shulker Boxes stacking up:
Enables empty Shulker Boxes stacking up to 64
when as items on the ground
Enables always rendering the F3 screen c: Enables always rendering the F3 screen cursor
If enabled, then before each block place:
If enabled, then before each block placement, the same block
is switched to hand that you are placing against
When enabled, invisible entities are ren:
hen enabled, invisible entities are rendered like
they would be in spectator mode.
Enables the Shulker Box contents display:
Enables the Shulker Box contents display when hovering
over them in an inventory and holding shift
Enables using the zoom hotkey to, well,: Enables using the zoom hotkey to, well, zoom in
Switches to the effective tool for the t: Switches to the effective tool for the targeted block
Removes the fog that boss mobs cause: Removes the fog that boss mobs cause
Prevents rendering dead mobs (entities t: Prevents rendering dead mobs (entities that are at 0 health)
Removes the entity rendering from mob sp: Removes the entity rendering from mob spawners
Removes the fog in the Nether: Removes the fog in the Nether
Disable Observers from triggering at all: Disable Observers from triggering at all
Disables the offhand item from getting r: Disables the offhand item from getting rendered
If enabled, then you can still open GUIs: If enabled, then you can still open GUIs while in a Nether Portal
Prevent the Sign edit GUI from opening: Prevent the Sign edit GUI from opening
Prevents all TileEntity renderers from r: Prevents all TileEntity renderers from rendering
Prevent all TileEntities from getting ti: Prevent all TileEntities from getting ticked
Prevents villager trades from ever locki:
Prevents villager trades from ever locking, by always incrementing
the max uses as well when the recipe uses is incremented
Touching a wall doesn't drop you out fro: Touching a wall doesn't drop you out from sprint mode
This is just for the mod internally to t:
This is just for the mod internally to track the
currently selected fly speed preset
The original gamma value, before the gam: The original gamma value, before the gamma override was enabled
The original slipperiness value of Slime: The original slipperiness value of Slime Blocks
When enabled, the movement inputs in the:
When enabled, the movement inputs in the Free Camera mode
will move the actual client player instead of the camera
The number of game ticks to hold down at: The number of game ticks to hold down attack
The number of game ticks between startin: The number of game ticks between starting to hold down attack (left click)
The number of game ticks to hold down us: The number of game ticks to hold down use
The number of game ticks between startin: The number of game ticks between starting to hold down use (right click)
Extra items that should be appended to t: Extra items that should be appended to the creative inventory.
Adds custom items to item groups.\nSee L:
Adds custom items to item groups.
See Lists -> 'creativeExtraItems' to control which items are added to the groups.
Note: Currently these will be added to the Transportation group
(because it has the elast items), but in the future
the groups will be configurable per added item
This tweak offsets the click position to:
This tweak offsets the click position to the adjacent air block
from the block that you actually click on.
that have a click action, such as opening inventory GUIs,
without having to sneak. Note that this doesn't not actually
fake sneaking in any way, just the apparent effect is similar.
Enables periodically holding attack for:
Enables periodically holding attack for a configurable amount of time.
Configure the interval in Generic -> periodicHoldAttackInterval
and the duration in periodicHoldAttackDuration
§6Note: You should not use the normal hold attack
§6or the periodic attack at the same time
Enables periodically holding use for a c:
Enables periodically holding use for a configurable amount of time.
Configure the interval in Generic -> periodicHoldUseInterval
and the duration in periodicHoldUseDuration
§6Note: You should not use the normal hold use
§6or the periodic use at the same time

Enables periodically holding use for a configurable amount of time.
Configure the interval in Generic -> periodicHoldUseInterval
and the duration in periodicHoldUseDuration\n§6Note: You should not use the normal hold use
§6or the periodic use at the same time
Allows the edge-most client-loaded chunk:
Allows the edge-most client-loaded chunks to render.
Vanilla doesn't allow rendering chunks that don't have
all the adjacent chunks loaded, meaning that the edge-most chunk
of the client's loaded won't render in vanilla.
§lThis is also very helpful in the Free Camera mode!§r
Grabs or ungrabs the mouse cursor, depen: Grabs or ungrabs the mouse cursor, depending on the current state
Disables the fog that increases around t: Disables the fog that increases around the render distance
Fixes the client world not removing the:
Fixes the client world not removing the old TileEntities,
when the client receives a chunk packet.
This caused a huge amount of TileEntities to accumulate
in the client world, until the game would crash or crawl to a halt.
If enabled, disables some client-side (r: If enabled, disables some client-side (rendering related) light updates
If enabled, disables ALL client-side lig:
If enabled, disables ALL client-side light updates.
This might look very bad unless you use the Gamma tweak.
When enabled, you can only break blocks:
When enabled, you can only break blocks in
a grid pattern, with a configurable interval.
To quickly adjust the value, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.
Enables the Breaking Restriction mode\n:
Enables the Breaking Restriction mode
  (Plane, Layer, Face, Column, Line, Diagonal)
When enabled, the attacks and use action:
When enabled, the attacks and use actions
(ie. left and right clicks) in Free Camera mode are
let through to the actual player.
Enables the slot sync workaround at all:
Enables the slot sync workaround at all times when the use key
is held, not only when using fast right click or fast block placement.
This is mainly for other mods that may quickly use items when
holding down use, such as Litematica's Easy Place mode.
If enabled, then the mouse sensitivity i:
If enabled, then the mouse sensitivity is reduced
while the zoom feature is enabled and the zoom key is active
Swaps the currently equipped item in the: Swaps the currently equipped item in the chest slot between an Elytra and a Chest Plate
tweakeroo.message.warning.block_type_bre: §6Block breaking prevented by Block Type Break Restriction tweak
tweakeroo.message.warning.entity_type_at: §6Entity attack prevented by Entity Type Attack Restriction tweak
